net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp
Class AbstractPacketizer

java.lang.Object
  net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp.AbstractPacketizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AACADTSPacketizer, AMRNBPacketizer, H263Packetizer, H264Packetizer
public abstract class AbstractPacketizer
extends java.lang.Object

Each packetizer inherits from this one and therefore uses RTP and UDP.

Sets the destination of the stream.

Parameters:
dest - The destination address of the stream
rtpPort - Destination port that will be used for RTP
rtcpPort - Destination port that will be used for RTCP
